dictionary.name: AluProfileDictionary
dictionary.translation: Dialog to create a Alu Profile on a path
Select the start plane to create the profile
Today this will be the center point of the profile. Coming soon: there will be a anchor selection on the profile too.
There will be a profile manager to add custom profiles.
The manufacture library holds some examples from Motedis (www.motedis.com) and Minitec (www.minitec.de) to show the svg support.
I have created the svg files based on the public step files from the manufacture.
The manufacture holds the copyright of the profile form.
There will be a profile manager to add custom profiles.
Both Sides (This functions is coming soon)
New Body and New Component are like the default operations on Fusion. New Feature uses the customFeature to create a simple editable element.
